All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
CORSFilter
Servlet Filter implementation class CORSFilter
Film
The model class for the Film object.
FilmAPI
Servlet for FilmAPI that fetches, inserts, deletes, updates and films from a database in JSON, XML and Text.
FilmDAO
Java class that uses SQL queries to perform CRUD and search operations on a database.
FilmList
Used to generate a list of films and film object based on XML schema to perform CRUD functions
FormatUtilsDelete
Java utils class that parses the response in JSON, XML and Text formats for the DELETE API operation to delete a film based on the ID.
FormatUtilsGet
Java utils class that parses the response in JSON, XML and Text formats for the GET API operation.
FormatUtilsPost
Java utils class that parses the response in JSON, XML and Text formats for the POST/Add API operation to add films based on the details entered.
FormatUtilsPut
Java utils class that parses the response in JSON, XML and Text formats for the PUT/Update API operation to update a film based on the ID.
Validator
Java utils class that sanitises and validates data (id, year and string inputs) from the server side.
